description: Join young Creatives from All Change’s B Creative arts activism programme for young women, to create original affirmation bracelets and black-out poetry. Express and share messages of hope and positivity for ourselves and our community.

factsheet.heading: Bartholomew Fayre:Affirmation Bracelets with All Change
paragraphs:
Join young Creatives from All Change’s B Creative arts activism programme for young women, to create original affirmation bracelets and black-out poetry. Express and share messages of hope and positivity for ourselves and our community.
All Change brings artists and communities together. Celebrating 40 years 1985-2025. B Creative is an arts activism project created by young women for young women age 16-25 working with inspiring artists, activists and cultural partners, since 2011.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre:Affirmation Bracelets with All Change
